Desc.entry: A unique collection of displays on life and work in the Sheffield area 1850-1950, including filemaking, cutlery manufacture, horn scalepressing, silversmithing, clog and shoemaking, basketmaking, grocery, chemists, pawnbrokers, opticians, electrical retailers, children's toys, Victorian office and domestic interiors. Holds Christmas fair in November.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Last Sat in the month 10.30am-4.30pm & some Bank Holiday Mondays (open days), visiting parties, groups and schools etc by appointment only
